entries.npc_1: Sorry, Huff's not seeing anyone today.  You'll have to move along.
entries.player_1: How come he's not seeing anyone?
entries.npc_2: He's very upset about a Tusken Rifle.  It was an antique, and someone's taken it off the planet.  He wants to get it back, but isn't sure how to go about it.
entries.npc_3: Huff Darklighter?  The head of the Darklighter estate?  He's only the biggest business magnate on Tatooine.  Where have you been?
entries.player_3: Where have you looked for the rifle?
entries.player_4: What do you know about the rifle?
entries.npc_4: We've checked everywhere on Tatooine.  Huff tried some of his contacts on Corellia but they were no help.  Personally I think it's on Naboo.
entries.npc_5: I hear some criminals got hold of it.  The criminal element has lots to do with these things, when stuff disappears you know?
entries.npc_6: Well, I suggest you take your head out of the sand and look around you.
entries.npc_7: Yeah, that guy.  Get it together.  You won't survive long on Tatooine if you can't keep up.
entries.player_8: I'm not ready to give it up yet.
entries.npc_9: Go on in then, and talk to Huff.  He'll be glad to see you.
entries.notyet: Huff doesn't want to be disturbed.  He's waiting for his shipment with a Tusken Rifle, and he's not talking to anyone until he finds out what happened to it.
